Text:
There was a previous version of this torrent for this audiobook. that one had a mistake in the name of a file:

[2-36] The Day the Stock Market Crashed (1929).mp3
was actually
[29-36] The Day the Stock Market Crashed (1929).mp3

To continue your download, erase the old .torrent file from your bittorrent client, rename manually the file listed above (add the missing 9), and download this new .torrent
